description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，中国人民武装警察部队中将。曾任中国人民武装警察部队副司令员、参谋长，第十一届全国政协常务委员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and a lieutenant general of the People's Armed Police Force. He served as Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff of the People's Armed Police Force, and was a Standing Committee Member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省下辖的地级市，陈传阔的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Anhui Province, the birthplace of Chen Chuankuo.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队中将

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队中将

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队的一种警衔等级，对应中将级别。
description.en: A rank in the People's Armed Police Force, equivalent to Lieutenant General.

en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队的一种警衔等级，对应少将级别。
description.en: A rank in the People's Armed Police Force, equivalent to Major General.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国政协常务委员

zh-cn: 第十一届全国政协常务委员

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会常务委员会的成员。
description.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 陈传阔于1966年1月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Chen Chuankuo joined the Communist Party of China in January 1966.

description.zh-cn: 陈传阔于1970年1月参加中国人民解放军。
description.en: Chen Chuankuo joined the People's Liberation Army in January 1970.

description.zh-cn: 陈传阔于1986年9月至1988年7月在国防大学基本一系学习。
description.en: Chen Chuankuo studied in the Basic Department I of the National Defence University from September 1986 to July 1988.

position.zh-cn: 机要局机要干部学校学员
position.en: Student at the Cadre School of the Confidential Bureau
Deputy Squad Leader of the Training Brigade
Staff Officer of the Military Training Section, Headquarters

position.zh-cn: 警卫局司令部军训处参谋
position.en: Staff Officer of the Military Training Division, Headquarters of the Guard Bureau

position.zh-cn: 警卫局司令部第一警卫处副处长、警卫局警卫处副团职参谋
position.en: Deputy Chief of the First Guard Division, Headquarters of the Guard Bureau; Deputy Regiment-level Staff Officer of the Guard Division

position.en: Deputy Chief and Chief of the Guard Division, Guard Bureau

position.en: Deputy Commander, Member of the Party Committee

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队中将
第十一届全国政协常务委员

description.zh-cn: 2008年当选第十一届全国政协常务委员，代表特别邀请人士，分入第五十六组，并担任经济委员会专委。
description.en: In 2008, he was elected as a Standing Committee member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, representing specially invited personages in the 56th group, and served as a special committee member of the Economic Committee.
